  physical_appearance: This is a brass sprinkler flask. It has a tall
 slender neck with a wide foot and body. The base
 body and nozzle are decorated with concentric rings. The neck does not have any carved rings. There are some minor scratches on the sprinkler
 especially on the neck. There are no inscriptions or decorative motifs seen.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a brass sprinkler flask. It has a tall, slender neck with a wide foot and body. The base, body and nozzle are decorated with concentric rings. The neck does not have any carved rings. There are some minor scratches on the sprinkler, especially on the neck. There are no inscriptions or decorative motifs seen.
